csharp.title: SoMedia
csharp.description: Developed a LinkedIn-style web application within a multidisciplinary Scrum team. Responsible for setting up RESTful APIs, implementing business logic, and handling database interactions using Entity Framework and LINQ.

unity.title: Simple VR Flight sim
unity.description: A simplified flight simulator built in Unity for ING events. Included a partial recreation of the Bijlmer area and full documentation via a Game Design Document.

unity.title: VR Communication Training for Pilots
unity.description: A VR training application for pilots on the Meta Quest, replacing a desktop version. Included 3D characters with emotional expressions and a virtual cabin with responsive passengers. Used Photon for multiplayer interaction and optimized for performance.

unity.title: VR Type Training Embraer E-jets
unity.description: Developed a 3D character with inverse kinematics for a VR application to help pilots prepare for type training. Worked in multiple Scrum sprints and delivered a configurable model capable of accurately interacting with cockpit buttons.

laravel.title: POS4 Kassasoftware Web Interface
laravel.description: During an internship, independently developed a complete web interface using Laravel, including database setup via migrations and automated testing with Laravel Dusk.
